# genesyscloud_intent_category (Data Source)

Genesys Cloud intent category data source. Select an intent category by name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "genesyscloud_intent_category" "example_intent_category" {
  name = "example intent category name"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) intent category name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
